title: lab-variables-and-memory-addresses
description: In this tutorial, we'll dive deeper into Python variables and memory addresses. We'll learn about variable assignment, mutable and immutable data types, and the `is` operator for comparing memory addresses.

verify.name: Please open the terminal and Python interpreter.
Compare memory addresses of mutable and immutable data types.
